segment.source: Windows Performance Analyzer in-product Getting Started Guide
segment.target: Windows Performance Analyzer in-product Getting Started Guide

segment.source: Windows Performance Analyzer in-product Getting Started Guide
segment.target: Windows Performance Analyzer in-product Getting Started Guide

segment.source: Windows Performance Analyzer in-product Getting Started Guide
segment.target: Windows Performance Analyzer in-product Getting Started Guide

segment.source: When you open Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA), by default, the Getting Started tab is displayed.
segment.target: When you open Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA), by default, the Getting Started tab is displayed.

segment.source: Getting Started is in-product help that provides an overview (with corresponding topics) to help you successfully ramp up into analyzing traces with WPA.
segment.target: Getting Started is in-product help that provides an overview (with corresponding topics) to help you successfully ramp up into analyzing traces with WPA.

segment.source: It features the following topics:
segment.target: It features the following topics:

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: These topics feature basic information for getting started.
segment.target: These topics feature basic information for getting started.

segment.source: For more in-depth information, refer to the Related Topics at the end of this topic.
segment.target: For more in-depth information, refer to the Related Topics at the end of this topic.

segment.source: Get Started: Provides instructions for three basic scenarios: opening a trace file, configuring symbols, and applying a profile.
segment.target: Get Started: Provides instructions for three basic scenarios: opening a trace file, configuring symbols, and applying a profile.

segment.source: Basic Actions: Provides instructions for using the Analysis Assistant, highlighting a time interval, and zooming, searching, and filtering data.
segment.target: Basic Actions: Provides instructions for using the Analysis Assistant, highlighting a time interval, and zooming, searching, and filtering data.

segment.source: View Data: Explains graphs and data tables.
segment.target: View Data: Explains graphs and data tables.

segment.source: Customization: Briefly explains customization.
segment.target: Customization: Briefly explains customization.

segment.source: Demos: Features links to videos that demonstrate Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) basics, advanced customizations, and Store App analysis.
segment.target: Demos: Features links to videos that demonstrate Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) basics, advanced customizations, and Store App analysis.

segment.source: Other Topics: Features a link to the MSDN Dev Center as well as popular performance topics.
segment.target: Other Topics: Features a link to the MSDN Dev Center as well as popular performance topics.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: These topics open in a separate browser window.
segment.target: These topics open in a separate browser window.

segment.source: To close Getting Started
segment.target: To close Getting Started

segment.source: Hover on the Getting Started tab and click X.
segment.target: Hover on the Getting Started tab and click X.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: By default, Getting Started opens every time you open WPA.
segment.target: By default, Getting Started opens every time you open WPA.

segment.source: If, during your session, you close Getting Started, you can reopen it to display in the product - even when the Analysis tab is open.
segment.target: If, during your session, you close Getting Started, you can reopen it to display in the product - even when the Analysis tab is open.
